Text.Page:
I may look like a monster, but once I was like you—an honorable soldier of the federation, an amani warrior who stormed these halls with Kaidun himself.

We all believed we could seize this place without breaking a sweat. By the time we realized these halls were filled with our worst nightmares, it was too late to retreat.

Most have gone completely mad, and some have changed into hideous creatures. Thulsa's cursed me by letting me keep my sanity—so I can see how far I've fallen."How can I help?"

You can't help me. My cursed body may look alive, but it's only because my soul is still trapped in it.

My mission is to liberate my comrades from their misery. Please help me release the {@LinkCreature:33#7#eldritch defenders}. I know they wouldn't want to continue on as Thulsa's lapdogs.

You cannot imagine the agony of watching your own body change of its own volition.

As for me, I can no longer imagine what "stability" feels like.

Thank you for helping them. Here's a reward for your deeds. This place may be old, but it holds many treasures.
